feature.label: Easy Explore plugin
feature.description:
Easy Explore 1.0.1 plugin for Eclipse Win-32 platform --------------------------------------------------------------
This little plugin permit you to browse resources with 'Windows Explorer' from Eclipse package/resources tree. Select resource and launch "Easy Explore..." menu item on resources/package explorer popup menu.
This plugin work ONLY on win32 platform.
